Title: Student and Staff Computing Devices
Any Additional Documentation Required: Form 1295, Letter of Intent for M/WBE subcontractors
Product: Student and staff computing devices, including laptops, desktops, tablet devices, and display monitors
Bid Summary: The Dallas Independent School District is soliciting offers for student and staff computing devices, including laptops, desktops, tablet devices, and display monitors
Product Specification: All equipment must be new and of the manufacturer's current model in production at the time of each order executed over the life of the contracts resulting from this RFP. Minimum specifications for student and staff devices include: Tier 1 Small Student Chromebook Laptop (Touch), Tier 2 Large Student Chromebook Laptop (Non-Touch), Tier 3 Student Windows Laptop, Student Tablet, Tier 1 Staff Basic Desktop, Tier 2 Staff Professional Desktop, Display Monitor - Touch, Display Monitor - Non-Touch
